localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Soundescape is a free web application for ambient background sounds. If you struggle to concentrate while working from home, this tool is for you! Audio is rendered in 3D, and you'll never hear the exact same combination of audio twice, as everything is generated randomly.
blogPost.body: Soundescape is a free web application for ambient background sounds. If you struggle to concentrate while working from home, this tool is for you! Audio is rendered in 3D, and you'll never hear the exact same combination of audio twice, as everything is generated randomly.
blogPost.title: Soundescape - Generative 3D audio environments for focused work
blogPost.author: Maximilian Torggler

localize.description: Soundescape是一款免费的环境背景音网络应用。如果你在家工作时难以集中精力，这个工具就是为你准备的。音频是以3D形式呈现的，你永远不会听到两次完全相同的音频组合，因为一切都是随机生成的。
localize.tagline: 专注工作的生成式3D音频环境

localize.description: Soundescape是一款免費的環境背景音網絡應用。如果你在家工作時難以集中精力，這個工具就是爲你準備的。音頻是以3D形式呈現的，你永遠不會聽到兩次完全相同的音頻組合，因爲一切都是隨機生成的。
localize.tagline: 專注工作的生成式3D音頻環境

previous.title:
Bitcoin hits $57,000 for the first time, nearly doubling since the start of the year.

A week ago it was at $47,000.
A month ago it was at $34,000.
A year ago it was at $9,000.

$BTC https://t.co/EScLC3yv1l

localize.full_text:
比特币首次达到57000美元，自年初以来几乎翻了一番。

一周前，它的价格是47000美元。
一个月前，它是在34000美元。
一年前，它是在9000美元。

$BTC https://t.co/EScLC3yv1l

比特幣首次達到57000美元，自年初以來幾乎翻了一番。

一週前，它的價格是47000美元。
一個月前，它是在34000美元。
一年前，它是在9000美元。

$BTC https://t.co/EScLC3yv1l

next.excerpt: With the new Apple Silicon Macs, A lot of people want to know about compatibility for specific apps, however, with thousands of apps that can be run on Mac it can be difficult to know if the app you need is compatible before you buy an Apple Silicon Mac.
next.title: Apple Silicon App Test - Test your apps for compatibility before you buy an M1 Mac

localize.description: 随着新的苹果Silicon Mac的推出，很多人都想了解特定应用的兼容性，然而，由于Mac上可以运行的应用有数千种，因此在购买苹果Silicon Mac之前，很难知道你需要的应用是否兼容。
localize.tagline: 在购买M1 Mac之前，请测试您的应用程序的兼容性。

localize.description: 隨着新的蘋果Silicon Mac的推出，很多人都想了解特定應用的兼容性，然而，由於Mac上可以運行的應用有數千種，因此在購買蘋果Silicon Mac之前，很難知道你需要的應用是否兼容。
localize.tagline: 在購買M1 Mac之前，請測試您的應用程序的兼容性。
